SEARCH
Package source.Database.Dao

Interface CampDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampDaoImpl
public interface CampDao
The CampDao interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage. Also provides a method to get an entire list of Camps and delete them.
Since:
11/19/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      boolean createCamp(Camp camp)
      Creates a camp in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to add

    • readCamp

      Camp readCamp(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads a Camp from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      the camp object if it was found in our database

    • readCamp

      Camp readCamp(DatabaseQuery[] query)
      Reads a Camp from the subsequent database using a given query and from which table MUST SATISFY ALL QUERIES. Should be mainly used for name queries.
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      the camp object if it was found in our database

    • readCamps

      ArrayList<Camp> readCamps(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all camps that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of camps if found, an empty list if not.

    • readCamps

      ArrayList<Camp> readCamps(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads all Enquiries that satisfies all the properties (Overloaded) NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      queries - queries to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of camps if found, an empty list if not.

    • updateCamp

      boolean updateCamp(Camp camp)
      Updates a camp in the subsequent database. Directly updates the file straight away.
      Parameters:
      camp - the camp to update
      Returns:
      true if managed to update, false if not

    • deleteCamp

      boolean deleteCamp(DatabaseQuery query)
      Deletes a camp in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

    • deleteCamp

      boolean deleteCamp(Camp camp)
      Deletes a camp in the subsequent database
      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

    • getCamps

      ArrayList<Camp> getCamps()
      Function to get the list of all Camp objects if needed
      Returns:
      the list of Camp stored in the database

    • refresh

      void refresh()
      Function to refresh the database by saving this context and then reading it again.

    • loadContext

      void loadContext()
      Function to reset the database by loading the context form the data files.
